title: Coronado National Memorial: Junior Cave Scientist
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Junior Cave Scientist              Junior Cave Scientist          Coronado National Memorial now offers a Junior Cave Scientist program at the park! Kids can complete a booklet and explore Coronado Cave to earn their Junior Cave Scientist badge.  For more information and to download a copy of the Junior Cave Scientist booklet see the National Park Service's Junior Cave Scientist page.
